key.name: workspace-indicator-position
key.summary: Which panel box to put the indicator in.

key.name: workspace-indicator-index
key.summary: The position of the indicator within the panel box.
key.description: 0 is the far-most position (left, center, or right). Higher numbers move it inward.

key.name: activities-button-mode
key.summary: How to handle the Activities Button.

key.name: enable-window-menu
key.description: A master switch to enable or disable all window titlebar context menu modifications.

key.name: visible-items
key.default: ["Scratch", "Take Screenshot", "Hide", "Maximize", "Move", "Resize", "Always on Top", "Always on Visible Workspace", "Move to Workspace Left", "Move to Workspace Right", "Move to Monitor Left", "Move to Monitor Right", "Close"]
key.summary: The window menu items to display.

key.name: font-desc
key.description: The Pango font description string for the lockscreen clock.

key.name: enable-unblank
key.description: If true, the lock screen will not fade to black.

key.name: power
key.summary: Only unblank when on AC power
key.description: If true, the screen will still blank when the device is on battery power.

key.name: time
key.description: Time in seconds before the screen blanks. Set to 0 to disable screen blanking entirely.

key.name: clock-weather-enabled
key.summary: Show weather next to the clock

key.name: google-calendar-handler-enabled
key.description: Hijacks the GNOME Shell calendar buttons to open Google Calendar in Firefox.

key.name: google-calendar-default-view
key.description: The view mode to open in Google Calendar (day, week, month, customweek).

key.name: hide-screenshot-button
key.summary: Hide the Screenshot button in Quick Settings.

key.name: system-menu-apps
key.summary: Applications to show in the system menu.

key.name: system-menu-position
key.description: The index to insert the buttons: 2 is far left, 3 is after Screenshot, 5 is after the divide, 6 is after Lock, and 7 is far right.
